Description:
Detects the download of suspicious file type from URLs with IP

Author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems), Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Unusual File Download from Direct IP Address
Query: sourcetype like 'windows-%' eql select * from _source_ where contents re 'http[s]?://[0-9]{1,3}\.[0-9]{1,3}\.[0-9]{1,3}\.[0-9]{1,3}' and (filepath like '%.ps1:zone%' or filepath like '%.bat:zone%' or filepath like '%.exe:zone%' or filepath like '%.vbe:zone%' or filepath like '%.vbs:zone%' or filepath like '%.dll:zone%' or filepath like '%.one:zone%' or filepath like '%.cmd:zone%' or filepath like '%.hta:zone%' or filepath like '%.xll:zone%' or filepath like '%.lnk:zone%')
